item.title: DWAC - Trump's Social Media Company
item.description: Trump announced this Wednesday October 20th that his new company called Trump Media & Technology Group (TMTG) would merge with a SPAC called Digital World Acquisition Company (DWAC), with the purpose of creating a new social media (similar to Twitter) called “Truth”.

item.title: Data Communications Management
item.description: Bottom line up front I am not taking a position in DCM as of today. While the stock is cheap in terms of multiples, the company is in the declining printing business and they need a mini-miracle to expand out of it into digital.
